name: LAMEPE -- LAME Preset Engineering
short_description: LAMEPE is a presetter for those who are using LAME MP3 Encoder (The best MP3 Encoder available today) but the target bitrate did not satisfy quality perceived.  We are heavily developing it in various ways.
